contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name= Yilo Krobo District |settlement_type=[[District]] |native_name = |nickname = |image_skyline = |image_size = |image_caption = |image_flag = |image_seal = |image_map = Eastern Ghana districts.png |map_caption = Eastern Region [[District|districts]] |pushpin_map=Ghana | pushpin_map_caption = Location of Yilo Krobo district in [[Eastern Region, Ghana|Eastern Region]] |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = GH |subdivision_type = |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = Region |subdivision_name1 = [[Eastern Region, Ghana|Eastern Region]] |subdivision_type2 = Capital |subdivision_name2 = [[Somanya]] |government_type = District Assembly |leader_title = District Executive |leader_name = C. K. Tettey |leader_title1 = <!-- Presiding Member<!-- for places with, say, both a mayor and a city manager --> |leader_name1 = |established_title = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 594 |area_land_km2 = |area_water_km2 = |population_as_of = 2013 |population_note = |population_total = — |population_metro = |population_density_km2 = |population_blank1_title =Ethnicities |population_blank1 = |timezone = [[Greenwich Mean Time]] |utc_offset = +0 |timezone_DST = [[Greenwich Mean Time|GMT]] |utc_offset_DST = |latd=6 |latm=6 |lats=36 |latNS=N |longd=0 |longm=6 |longs=36 |longEW=W |coordinates_type = |elevation_m = | iso_code = |blank_name = |blank_info = |website = |footnotes = }} The '''Yilo Krobo District''' is one of the twenty-one (21) [[District|districts]] of the [[Eastern Region, Ghana|Eastern Region]] of south [[Ghana]].<ref name="Yilo Krobo district">[http://www.yilokrobo.ghanadistricts.gov.gh/ Yilo Krobo district]</ref> The capital is [[Somanya]]. ==Geography== The Yilo Krobo district is approximately between latitude 60 .00’N and 00 .30’N and between longitude 00 . 30’ and 10 .00’W. It covers an estimated area of 805sq.km, constituting 4.2 percent of the total area of the [[Eastern Region (Ghana)|Eastern Region]] with [[Somanya]] as its capital. The Yilo Krobo district is bounded in the north and east by [[Lower Manya Krobo District]], in the South by [[Akuapim North District]] and on the West by [[New-Juaben Municipal District]], [[East Akim Municipal District]] and [[Fanteakwa District]].<ref name="Yilo Krobo district"/> ==References== {{reflist}} ==Sources== * {{statoids|id=ygh|title=Districts of Ghana}} * [http://www.ghanadistricts.com/index.asp GhanaDistricts.com] {{Eastern Region, Ghana}} <!--{{coord|6.105|N|0.016|W|type:adm2nd_source:itwiki|display=title}}--> [[Category:Districts of the Eastern Region (Ghana)]]
